attributes.action: Create National Disability Vehicle Fuel Duty Capping/Subsidised Benefit Scheme!.
attributes.additional_details:
Create National Disability Vehicle Fuel Duty Capping/Subsidised Benefit Scheme, for disabled drivers and passengers plus families in the UK.

We are asking the Treasury Ministers and the Coalition Government, plus Select Committee’s for Treasury and Transport, to review increasing vehicle fuel and they are disadvantaging disabled people especially and unfairly to others in society.

Also ask for a free MP’s debate in the House of Common’s, over Create National Disability Vehicle Fuel Duty Capping/Subsidised Benefit Scheme too.

PLEASE EVERYONE SIGN UP TO THIS E-PETITION, TO SUPPORT DISABLED PEOPLE. ALSO INFORM OTHERS ABOUT THIS TOO, THANK YOU CONARD, WENDY & DAVID DMFed
